title: Supported Cuda Graphics Cards - what are other people using?
body:
I downloaded the Windows executables and have been able to clean couple of large files. However it takes too long for the process to finish on the machine I am using.

In the exe help document, the requirements are as follows for the GPU version:

Only suppport NVidia GPU above gtx1060(Driver:above 460 & CUDA:11.0)
1.Download and install Microsoft Visual C++ https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe
2.Update your gpu drive to 460(or above) https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/drivers/
3.Download and install CUDA 11.0: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit-archive

My question is this... do I have to get gtx1060? Are there anything that is little bit more budget friendly that is supported? For example GT 1030? 

Will cards that support Driver Version 460 and CUDA 11.0 work with the GPU executable?

Thanks
SeaTV
